polls.question: Would you like to quit smoking?
polls.answers: Yes, I would.--|--No, I'm happy with smoking.--|--No, I'm not smoking.--|--Ohter (see my comment).

comments.body: If you would like to quit smoking, [Allen Carr's video - Easyway to Stop Smoking](http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/?Video=1559642472_1HEBittLV8ADkGMhNehgZKsciCokp1RhUW) can help a lot to achieve your goal.
